name: Honeycomb SR MPLS
description: Examples of configuring some basic MPLS SR scenariou using hc2vpp

requests.name: Swap 104 and forward via veth341
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add eos 104 via 10.34.1.4 host-veth341 out-labels 104


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 104

requests.name: Pop 102 and IPv4 lookup
requests.description:
In case 102 is the last label,
pop it and check if we have route for destination.

requests.name: Pop 103 and MPLS lookup
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add non-eos 103 mpls-lookup-in-table 0


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 103

requests.name: Enable mpls on host-veth12
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth12 enable

requests.name: Send traffic to B via 104
requests.description: Simulates route that could be received via BGP.

requests.name: Create config for vrf0
requests.description: Hc2vpp by default stores it under learned-protocol-0

requests.name: Enable mpls on host-veth42
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth42 enable

requests.name: Enable mpls on host-veth21 interface
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth21 enable

requests.name: Add reverse direction for 10.12.1.0/24
requests.description:
Send reverse traffic using IP.

Corresponding CLI command:

ip route add 10.12.1.0/24 via 10.24.1.2 host-veth42

requests.name: Swap 10341 and forward via veth341
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add eos 10341 via 10.34.1.4 host-veth341 out-labels 104


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 10341

requests.name: Send traffic to A via 103, 104
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

ip route add 10.100.1.1/24 via 10.13.1.3 host-veth13 out-labels 103 104

Can be verified via CLI using:

show ip fib 10.100.1.1/24

requests.name: Swap 10342 and forward via veth342
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add eos 10342 via 10.34.2.4 host-veth342 out-labels 104


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 10342

requests.name: Swap 104 and forward
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add eos 104 via 10.24.1.4 host-veth24 out-labels 104


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 104

requests.name: Delete rule for traffic to A
Delete rule for traffic to B
Pop 102 and MPLS lookup
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add non-eos 102 mpls-lookup-in-table 0


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 102

requests.name: Delete rule for traffic to B
Enable mpls on veth431
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth431 enable

requests.name: Send traffic to A via 103, 10341
requests.description:
Node + adjacency SID example.

Steers traffic to A veth341 (the first interface between vpp3 and vpp4).

requests.name: Delete rule for traffic to A
Send traffic to B via 102,104
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

ip route add 10.200.1.1/24 via 10.12.1.2 host-veth12 out-labels 102 104

Can be verified via CLI using:

show ip fib 10.200.1.1/24

requests.name: Enable mpls on host-veth341
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth341 enable

requests.name: Send traffic to A via 103, 10342
requests.description:
Node + adjacency SID example.

Steers traffic to A veth342 (the second interface between vpp3 and vpp4).

requests.name: Enable mpls on host-veth24 interface
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth24 enable

requests.name: Add reverse direction for 10.13.1.0/24
requests.description:
Send reverse traffic using IP.

Corresponding CLI command:

ip route add 10.13.1.0/24 via 10.34.2.3 host-veth432

requests.name: Enable mpls on host-veth342
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth342 enable

requests.name: Swap 104 and forward via veth342
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add eos 104 via 10.34.2.4 host-veth342 out-labels 104


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 104

requests.name: Enable mpls on veth432
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth432 enable

requests.name: Enable mpls on host-veth31
requests.description:
Correspondig CLI command:

set interface mpls host-veth31 enable

requests.name: Pop 104 and IPv4 lookup
requests.description:
Corresponding CLI command:

mpls local-label add eos 104 ip4-lookup-in-table 0


Can be verified via CLI using:

show mpls fib 104
